name: Runeborn
description: Runeborn is a blockchain-based strategic card battling game built on the Solana network where fantasy meets competitive gameplay. Players collect unique cards with varying rarities, build customized decks, and engage in turn-based battles against opponents in a medieval fantasy world. The game features a complete card economy with pack openings, card synthesis systems, and real-time multiplayer battles. Runeborn combines traditional trading card game mechanics with blockchain technology to provide true ownership, a player-driven economy, and transparent on-chain transactions.
